description: The One Direction star, who welcomed baby Freddie Reign last week, is alleged to have spent days with Briana choosing a name they both love for their son.
title: Louis Tomlinson and Briana Jungwirth 'chose baby Freddie Reign's name together'
title_page: Louis Tomlinson and Briana Jungwirth 'chose baby Freddie Reign's name together' | Daily Mail Online
text:
He became a father for the first time last week when his former flame Briana Jungwirth welcomed a baby boy.
And Louis Tomlinson is reportedly relishing every minute spent with his son Freddie Reign, proudly sharing a photograph of the newborn with his fans on Wednesday for the very first time.
Not only is the One Direction singer taking an active role in parenthood, but he is also alleged to have spent days with Briana choosing a name they both love, ensuring it was a mutual decision.
Scroll down for video
Doting dad: One Direction's Louis Tomlinson, pictured visiting his newborn son Freddie Reign in Los Angeles on Wednesday, is making his son his top priority and reportedly spent ages picking out the name with the baby's mother, Briana Jungwirth
A source close to Louis told MailOnline: ‘Louis and Briana picked out the name together over the last few days.
‘Louis is already loving being a father and is so proud of Freddie. His son is his number one priority and he’s supporting Briana and Freddie in every way possible.
‘His mum and her husband are in Los Angeles with Louis to help Louis, Briana and her family in any way they can.’
The Perfect hitmaker and his former flame were said to have disagreed about what to call their child, with Louis wanting a more traditional name than his ex, but the insider insisted that couldn't have been further from the truth.
'Love of my life': Louis' former flame Briana also shared a photo with the sweet little boy. An insider told MailOnline: 'His son is his number one priority and he’s supporting Briana and Freddie in every way possible'
TMZ reported that Louis and Briana eventually compromised about the name; with the 1D star picking out the first moniker and Briana choosing the middle name.
The gossip site claimed the blonde beauty originally had her heart set on Rain, but opted to spell it Reign to give it a more manly feeling.
This comes after Louis shared the first picture of his newborn baby son on social media, sending fans into a frenzy with the adorable image.
The 24-year-old pop star took to Twitter on Wednesday evening to reveal not only a tender image of his first child, but also his full name.
In the touching black and white snap, the boyband heartthrob stands shirtless as he cradles his sweet little lad for an intimate selfie.
Proud daddy: Louis shared the adorable first image of his newborn son Freddie on Twitter on Wednesday
Louis captioned the heartwarming image, in which you could also see the tattoo inked across his chest: 'Meet my little lad, Freddie'.
Then minutes later he tweeted that the little tyke will carry his last name Tomlinson, writing: 'Freddie Tommo'.
Shortly after, the British star, who is currently in California spending time with his newborn, added his gratitude to his fans for their well wishes: 'Thank you so much for the all nice messages :)'.
Fans of the Steal My Girl hitmaker have also picked up on the fact that his former 1D co-star Zayn Malik has liked a retweeted picture of Louis with Freddie on Twitter.
Meanwhile, Briana - who gave birth a week ago - also shared a photo of the baby boy on Instagram, revealing that his middle name is Reign.
Chuffed: Louis also revealed on Twitter that Freddie will take his second name Tomlinson, calling him 'Freddie Tommo', before thanking his fans for the 'nice messages'
The picture showed the little boy bundled up in her arms as she lay in a hospital bed, and she captioned it: '1/21/16. Freddie Reign. Love of my life.'
Fans had speculated before Louis revealed his son's moniker that he'd named the boy Sydney Rain.
However, on Wednesday he dispelled such talk, revealing that he and his ex-girlfriend Briana had settled on a much more traditional name for the child.
Louis proudly confirmed the birth of his son on Saturday, after rumours of the birth were spread online by his loyal fans over the previous 24 hours.
The excited star posted on Twitter: 'I'm pleased to say my baby son was born yesterday :) He is healthy and pretty amazing, I'm very happy!!'
He then indicated he was relishing his new status as a parent as he added: 'Daddy daddy cool,' moments later.
Special time: She only gave birth to her baby boy on Thursday, but Briana looked incredible when she was pictured out with her bundle of joy for the first time in LA on Wednesday
And as if his happiness wasn't evident enough, he followed his latest comment up with three smiley faces which appeared as ':) :) :)', on his personal account.
Despite claims the One Direction star had splashed out on a multi-million pound pad for Briana and their son, TMZ have reported that Louis is leasing a much more modest three bedroom home in Calabasas for her and Freddie.
The report claims 'the home is in the hundreds of thousands of dollars ... not in the millions,' while stylist Briana has been paying for furniture.
What a man: The day before, Louis was pictured talking on his mobile phone as he went to visit his baby once again on Tuesday
Daddy cool: He looked casual as he stepped out while chatting on the phone
Louis meanwhile is renting his own home nearby for at least the next six months so he can be close to his son, with previous reports suggesting his five-bed mansion is worth £10million.
It's not yet known if Louis and Briana has settled on a child support figure yet with The Sun claiming this week that the Brit singer will 'pay more than £2.1million in child support.'
The paper reports that the star has agreed to pay almost £10,000 a month for his son, although it's noted that child support payments in California are based on income and the child's needs.
Revealed: Last week, Louis announced his happy news on Twitter
The 1D star was pictured going to meet his pride and joy as well as his former flame in Calabasas, along with another friend on Monday, stopping by Briana's modest-looking apartment.
Louis is now dating new girlfriend Danielle Campbell, 20, with the pair spotted out and about on several occasions together in Los Angeles over the last few weeks.
Recently, a friend of Louis' exclusively told the MailOnline that singer is planning to be a hands-on dad and support Briana in any way he can, despite being in a new relationship with Disney star Danielle.
The pal said: 'Although they're not romantically involved, Louis thinks Briana is a great woman and will be a fabulous mother.'
Romance: Last year, Briana and Louis were seen enjoying a string of nights out, although they aren't believed to have actually been in a proper relationship
The news that Louis and Briana would be having a baby together was revealed in July last year, while he was in the midst of One Direction's On The Road Again world tour.
Louis, who rose to fame in 2010 with the X Factor pop group, later confirmed the baby news the following month, during an interview in the US, admitting, 'it's a very exciting time, so I'm buzzing.'
The singer and the stylist were first seen partying together in May around Los Angeles.
And, while they were never said to have had a proper relationship, it's thought they were involved in a brief fling.
However, they have maintained a close relationship in the past year, with Louis regularly returning to the US, and their families met up as the birth drew nearer.
